content.raw: The package is using my usual debian script and running the debian QA checker, the errors come from it. They are expected, most of them comes from the fact of installing things in /op, others affect the packaging and are not important and there is one that I would like to solve in the near future that is about splitting the python part of that package.
content.html: The package is using my usual debian script and running the debian QA checker, the errors come from it. They are expected, most of them comes from the fact of installing things in /op, others affect the packaging and are not important and there is one that I would like to solve in the near future that is about splitting the python part of that package.
